/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching towards the sky, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure.
